amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report to Congress on goods purchased by the Department of Homeland Security that were manufactured outside of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3602 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3602 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S9119-9120; text: CR S9119) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report to Congress on goods purchased by the Department of Homeland Security that were manufactured outside of the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3602 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3602 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold.
